channel.title: Remote Sensing on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Remote Sensing on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] [Introduction] Satellite data analysis using Python (Google Colab environment)
item.description: ## Introduction-What is satellite data- Artificial satellite data refers to data acquired by “remote sensing” using artificial satellites. Until now, satellite data required specialized tools and a large-capacity data processing platform, so the available organizations were limited to university institutions and some specialized institutions, but the spread of open source libraries and data By using the processing infrastructure cloud, an external environment has been set up in which general organizations can easily handle satellite data.
